alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 11:25PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG WIND GUSTS WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL BIG HORN... NORTHEASTERN STILLWATER...NORTH CENTRAL CARBON...WESTERN YELLOWSTONE...MUSSELSHELL AND EASTERN GOLDEN VALLEY COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM MDT... At 1123 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong winds from showers and thunderstorms moving east at 35 mph. The leading edge of the strong winds were along a line extending from 17 miles northeast of Ryegate to 22 miles northwest of Billings West End to near Absarokee. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Columbus, Roundup, Laurel, Joliet, Fromberg, Lockwood, Worden, Huntley, Pryor, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Absarokee, Ballantine, Broadview, Lavina, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Edgar, and Silesia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
